title: Implement Feature Detail page with sub-features, tasks, and AI context
problem: Need feature detail page from file_119: breadcrumb nav, feature header with stats, acceptance criteria checklist, AI context card, dependency chain, expandable sub-features with task tables, activity sidebar
scope: Create FeatureDetailPage component (file_119 design). Route: /projects/:projectId/features/:featureId. Components: breadcrumb, feature header, acceptance criteria, AI context (collapsible), dependency mini-map, sub-feature sections with task tables, activity sidebar. Full backend wiring.
acceptanceCriteria: Breadcrumb: Claw Control Center / Key Features / [Feature Name]
Feature header: name + priority badge + status badge, description, owner, updated time, links, stats (X/Y tasks done, progress %)
Acceptance criteria panel: checkboxes + text, mark done on click
AI Context card: collapsible reasoning section, confidence %, Generated by TARS timestamp, Regenerate button
Dependency mini-map: visual chain showing sub-features with arrows, status colors
Sub-features section: expandable panels (click to open), task table with columns (Status icon | Task | Tag | Pri | Status | Assignee)
Task rows: clickable, hover state, done tasks show strikethrough + dimmed
+ Add task button per sub-feature
+ Add Sub-Feature button
Right sidebar: Acceptance Criteria + Feature Activity feed
Backend: GET /api/pm/projects/:projectId/features/:featureId (feature detail)
Backend: GET /api/pm/projects/:projectId/features/:featureId/subfeatures (sub-features + tasks)
Backend: PATCH /api/pm/projects/:projectId/features/:featureId/criteria/:index (toggle acceptance)

Wire to .clawhub/projects/:projectId/ storage structure
Test expanding/collapsing sub-features
Test all backend endpoints work
Screenshot matches file_119 design

scope: Worker service daemon per slot, real heartbeat tracking, task queue polling, session lifecycle management
acceptanceCriteria: Worker service per slot (pm, architect, dev-1, dev-2, qa)
Services poll task queue and pick up matching tasks
Spawn Claude sessions for actual work via sessions_spawn
Update heartbeats with real status (working/idle/offline)
Task status updated automatically (in-progress/done/blocked)
Services restart on crash
Remove fake slot-heartbeats.mjs

title: Fix: Display agent names instead of slot IDs in task views
problem: Tasks show owner as "dev-1", "architect" etc. instead of actual agent names like "Forge", "Blueprint"
scope: Task detail views, task cards - map slot IDs to agent names
acceptanceCriteria: Task owner displays as "Forge" not "dev-1"
Task owner displays as "Blueprint" not "architect"
Task owner displays as "TARS" not "pm"
Map covers all slots: pm→TARS, architect→Blueprint, dev-1→Forge, dev-2→Patch, qa→Sentinel
Works in task cards, task drawer, and all views
Fallback to slot ID if name not found

title: Feature: Click agent tile to edit worker metadata
problem: Users need ability to click worker agent tiles and edit their name, role, model, etc.
scope: MissionControl agent tiles - make clickable, add edit modal, persist metadata
acceptanceCriteria: Worker tiles (pm, architect, dev-1, dev-2, qa) are clickable
Click opens edit modal with fields: name, role, model, emoji
Changes persist to worker-metadata.json or similar
Metadata displays on tile after edit
Bridge API endpoints for CRUD on worker metadata
Clean modal UI matching agent profile modal style

title: Feature: Enhanced blocked task display with resolution options
problem: Blocked tasks need to show blocker details, resolution steps, and copy-friendly code snippets
scope: Mission Control blocked section - add blocker detail panel
acceptanceCriteria: Blocked tasks show blocker description (only when blocked)
Resolution options/steps displayed clearly
Code snippets have copy button for UX
Panel only appears for blocked tasks
Clean, actionable UI

title: PM: Migrate AGENTS.md/SOUL.md guidance into rules
problem: Existing workspace guidance needs to be converted to rules with appropriate severity/category
scope: Extract rules from AGENTS.md, SOUL.md, HEARTBEAT.md and create via API
acceptanceCriteria: All hard constraints become Critical rules
Workflow policies become Required rules
Best practices become Standard rules
Suggestions become Guidance rules
Each rule has appropriate category
No personal/private data included

title: UI: Add filter controls for severity and category
problem: Users need to filter rules by severity and category
scope: src/pages/Config.tsx - Add filter UI
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown to filter by severity (All/Critical/Required/Standard/Guidance)
Dropdown to filter by category (All/Workflow/Communication/etc)
Search box filters by title/description/content
Filters work together (AND logic)
Filter state persists during session

title: UI: Display severity badges + category grouping in Config
problem: Config page needs to show severity levels and organize rules by category
scope: src/pages/Config.tsx - Rules tab redesign
acceptanceCriteria: Severity shown as colored badges (Critical=red, Required=orange, Standard=blue, Guidance=gray)
Rules grouped by category with collapsible sections
Category selector in create rule form
Severity selector in create rule form
Edit form includes severity + category fields

title: Bridge: Support severity + category in rules endpoints
problem: Bridge API needs to accept/persist severity and category fields
scope: bridge/rules.mjs + bridge/server.mjs routes
acceptanceCriteria: POST /api/rules accepts severity and category
Rules.json persists new fields
Default severity is "standard" if not provided
Existing rules without fields still work

title: Types: Add severity + category to Rule type
problem: Rule type needs severity (critical/required/standard/guidance) and category (Workflow/Communication/etc)
scope: src/types.ts - extend Rule interface
acceptanceCriteria: Rule has severity?: "critical" | "required" | "standard" | "guidance"
Rule has category?: string
Backward compatible (fields are optional)
tsc passes

title: Epic: Rules system v2 - Severity levels + categories + workspace integration
problem: Rules need severity levels (Critical/Required/Standard/Guidance), categories, and integration with existing workspace guidance files
scope: Data model update, bridge API, UI redesign, migration of AGENTS.md/SOUL.md guidance into rules
acceptanceCriteria: Rules have severity field (critical/required/standard/guidance)
Rules have category field (Workflow, Communication, Safety, Agent Mgmt, Memory, Personality)
UI displays rules grouped by severity/category
Existing guidance from AGENTS.md/SOUL.md migrated to rules
No personal data in codebase - only connections to files
Filter/search by severity and category

title: Feature: Rules system with local storage + bidirectional sync
problem: Rules need single source of truth - if user adds in UI or PM adds from chat, both sides see it
scope: rules.json storage, bridge API endpoints, Config page integration, PM reads rules at session start
acceptanceCriteria: rules.json file for persistent storage
Bridge API: GET/POST/PATCH/DELETE /api/rules
Config page reads/writes through adapter
PM reads rules on startup/heartbeat
Adding rule in UI → PM sees it
PM adding rule from chat → UI shows it
